title: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: In the ImageAnalyzer example, when opening a small image like an icon, the scrollbars are enabled although they have no effect. The scrollbars can be moved around, but they do not scroll the image.
EB: In the ImageAnalyzer example, the scrollbars should be disabled when opening a small image such as an icon.
SR: 1. Launch the ImageAnalyzer example. 2. Open a small image such as an icon. 3. Verify that the scrollbars are disabled and do not allow scrolling.
